epic.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendations
epic.description: Develop and deploy an AI-driven recommendation system that enhances user experience by suggesting relevant products based on historical and real-time user behavior.

stories.title: Implement AI Recommendation Engine
stories.description: Develop and integrate an AI-based recommendation system to suggest relevant products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptanceCriteria: System generates at least 5 relevant product recommendations for each user session based on browsing and purchase history
Recommendations update dynamically within the same user session based on interactions
Recommendation system achieves at least 70% click-through rate in controlled A/B testing
Recommendations load within 500ms under expected load
System supports 10,000 concurrent users without degradation of performance
Data privacy compliance with GDPR is maintained for all recommendation processing and storage

tasks.title: Set up user activity tracking module
tasks.description: Implement tracking for browsing and purchase history to feed into recommendation engine.

tasks.title: Integrate product catalog database
tasks.description: Ensure recommendation system can access up-to-date product information for suggestions.

tasks.title: Build machine learning model training pipeline
tasks.description: Develop and deploy the training and retraining pipeline for the recommendation model.

tasks.title: Integrate recommendation engine into user interface
tasks.description: Display recommendations within the product pages and home page sections.

tasks.title: Implement dynamic recommendation updates
tasks.description: Ensure recommendations refresh in real-time as users interact with products.

tasks.title: Conduct A/B testing for recommendation accuracy
tasks.description: Run experiments to ensure target CTR of 70% is achieved.

tasks.title: Optimize performance for recommendations
tasks.description: Ensure system responds within 500ms and can handle 10,000 concurrent sessions.

tasks.title: Ensure GDPR compliance
tasks.description: Verify that data processing meets GDPR privacy and data handling regulations.
